response.overview: When world-renowned vampire hunter, Ophelia Hunt, stumbles into the castle of the ancient Matriarch vampire, Desdemona Vlada, she barely escapes with her life. But when she wakes up one night, almost exactly a year after her harrowing experience with the Matriarch to find a pair of glowing, yellow eyes outside of her window, she realizes that the nightmare is only just beginning...
response.tagline: "She's vicious, she's incorrigible, she's... so gorgeous."
response.title: Teeth
